ruleBookInfo.intro:
<js>
var tag1='@get:{name}';

var tag2='@get:{author}';

var rtag3='@get:{word}';
var number = parseInt(rtag3);
if (number >= 10000) {
	tag3 = (number / 10000).toFixed(2) + '万字';
} else {
	tag3 = number+'字';
}

var tag4=java.getString('.divbox@h3@text');
var tag5=String(java.getString('.tabvalue@.hide@tbody@tr.0@td.2@text')).replace(/最后更新：/,'');

var tag6=String(java.getString('.tabvalue@.hide@tbody@tr.0@td.1@text')).replace(/连载状态：/,'');
var tag7=String(java.getString('.tabvalue@.hide@tbody@tr.0@td.0@text')).replace(/作品分类：/,'');

var tag8=String(java.getString('.tabvalue@.hide@tbody@tr.1@td.0@text')).replace(/作品性质：/,'');
var tag9=String(java.getString('.tabvalue@.hide@tbody@tr.1@td.2@text')).replace(/首发网站：/,'');

var tag10=java.getString('.tabvalue@.hide@tbody@tr.2@td.1@text').match(/\d+/,'$');

var tag11=java.getString('.ratediv@span.0@text');
var tag12=java.getString('.ratediv@span.1@text');

var rtag13=java.getString('#totalView@text');
var number = parseInt(rtag13);
if (number >= 10000) {
	tag13 = (number / 10000).toFixed(2) + '万';
} else {
	tag13 = number;
}

var rtag14=java.getString('id.totalVote@text');
var number = parseInt(rtag14);
if (number >= 10000) {
	tag14 = (number / 10000).toFixed(2) + '万';
} else {
	tag14 = number;
}

var tag15=String(java.getString('.tabvalue.0@text')).replace (/\s{2,}/g,'');

var rtag16=String(java.getString('class.c_row@html'));
rtag16=rtag16.replace(/\d{2}:\d{2}:\d{2}/g, '').replace(/<span class="fr"[^>]*>[\s\S]*?<\/span>/g, '').replace(/<a class="pop"[^>]*>[\s\S]*?<\/a>/g, '').replace(/<[^>]+>/g, '').replace(/ /g, ' ').trim();
var lines=rtag16.split('\n');
var tag16='';
var isUsernameLine=true;
for (var i = 0; i < lines.length; i++) {
var line = lines[i].trim();
if (!line) continue;
if (isUsernameLine) {
tag16 += '🏮' + line + '\n';
isUsernameLine = false;
} else if (line.startsWith('时间：')) {
tag16 += line + '\n\n';
isUsernameLine = true;
} else {
tag16 += line + '\n';
}
}
tag16.trim();

var result=' \n'+
'📕 书名：'+tag1+'\n'+
'👤 作者：'+tag2+'\n'+
'✍️ 字数：'+tag3+'\n'+
'⚡ 最新：'+tag4+'    '+tag5+'\n'+
'⏳ 状态：'+tag6+'    '+tag7+'\n'+
'💎 性质：'+tag8+'    '+tag9+'\n'+
'🔢 章数：'+tag10+'\n'+
'⭐ 评分：'+tag11+tag12+'\n'+
'▶️ 点击：'+tag13+'\n'+
'🚀 推荐：'+tag14+'\n'+
'📝 简介：'+tag15+'\n'+
'💬 评论：'+'评论区全是广告😅'+'\n'+tag16;
result
</js>

match=result.match(/d\(".+"[^"]+".+"\)/)
function d(a, b){
	b = java.md5Encode(b)
	iv = b.substring(0, 16)
	key = b.substring(16)
	Cipher=java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/CBC/PKCS7Padding" ,key,iv)
	return Cipher.decryptStr(a)}
eval(match[0])
</js>
